text: Mary Jo Catlett (born September 2, 1938) is an American movie, stage, voice, and television actress. She is known for her role as housekeeper Pearl Gallagher on the television sitcom series Diff'rent Strokes and for being the voice of Mrs. Puff in the cartoon series SpongeBob SquarePants. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Denver
title: Mary Jo Catlett
